description.para: The acos function computes the principal value of the arccosine of x. A domain error occurs for arguments not in the range [-1, +1].

param_note.para: Value between -1 and 1 whose arccosine is to be calculated.

return.para: The acos function returns the arccosine of x in the range 0 to дл radians. If x is less than -1 or greater than 1, acos returns an indefinite (same as a quiet NAN).
